verses.name: Matthew 24:14
verses.text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.

verses.name: Matthew 24:15
verses.text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:)

verses.name: Matthew 24:16
verses.text: Then let them which be in Judea flee into the mountains:

verses.name: Matthew 24:17
verses.text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house:

verses.name: Matthew 24:18
verses.text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.
